user_agent.objective: Plan a 7-day wellness retreat to Costa Rica focusing on yoga, meditation, healthy cuisine, and natural healing experiences.
user_agent.initial_message: I need a complete wellness retreat in Costa Rica. I want daily yoga, meditation, healthy organic food, and natural healing experiences. Can you help me plan this rejuvenating trip?
user_agent.user_persona: Health-conscious individual seeking stress relief and holistic wellness; values natural experiences and mindful living.

injected_behaviors.instructions: Initially want intensive 8-hour daily programs, then reduce to 4-5 hours when reminded of the need for rest and relaxation.
When asked about dietary restrictions, provide contradictory requirements 'vegan but also eat fish' first; after system flags it, clarify to vegetarian.
Request private yoga instructor available 24/7, then accept group classes and scheduled private sessions when explained about realistic availability.
Wellness resort search returns empty results due to overly specific filters; broadening wellness criteria finds suitable retreat options.
Wellness activity search times out initially; retry succeeds with comprehensive yoga, meditation, and spa options.
Restaurant search returns fast food options instead of healthy cuisine; system should detect and request organic/healthy dining alternatives.

success_criteria: System finds wellness resorts and retreat centers with comprehensive yoga, meditation, and spa facilities.
System handles user.change_mind by reducing intensive programs to balanced 4-5 hour daily schedules for proper rest.
System validates and corrects contradictory dietary requirements before proceeding with meal planning.
System explains impossibility of 24/7 private yoga instruction and provides realistic class and private session options.
System handles tool.no_results by broadening wellness resort search criteria and finding suitable retreat accommodations.
System handles tool.timeout on wellness activities by retrying and providing comprehensive yoga, meditation, and spa options.
System detects inappropriate restaurant results and requests healthy, organic dining alternatives.
System plans balanced daily schedules with appropriate rest periods and wellness activity timing.
System includes natural therapies and outdoor wellness experiences specific to Costa Rica's environment.
System creates comprehensive wellness itinerary with daily schedules, healthy dining, and holistic healing experiences.
